# MISC::DISPLAY_ONSCREEN_KEYBOARD_WITH_LONGER_INITIAL_STRING

## Parameters
* **eKeyboardType** keyboardTypeFlag
* **STRING** prompt
* **STRING** description
* **STRING** initialValue1
* **STRING** initialValue2
* **STRING** initialValue3
* **STRING** initialValue4
* **STRING** initialValue5
* **STRING** initialValue6
* **STRING** initialValue7
* **STRING** initialValue8
* **INT** maxLength

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Variant of DISPLAY_ONSCREEN_KEYBOARD which takes up to eight strings to support an initial value of 500 characters
